title: Citi Handlowy Sponsors Golf Development Initiatives
summary: Warsaw – Citi Handlowy became a title sponsor of the Golf Masters Series – a series of 12 national championship tournaments under the auspices of the Polish Golf Union. The first event launching the series of events and the golf season was the fifth Matchplay Polish Championship held May 13-15 at the Rosa Golf Private Club course. The bank's engagement in this sport is not an accident – Citi Handlowy has been supporting golf initiatives for years, and Citigroup is the official partner of the Ryder Cup Europe.
tag-1: Citi Handlowy Sponsors Golf Development Initiatives
tag-2: Warsaw – Citi Handlowy became a title sponsor of the Golf Masters Series – a series of 12 national championship tournaments under the auspices of the Polish Golf Union. The first event launching the series of events and the golf season was the fifth Matchplay Polish Championship held May 13-15 at the Rosa Golf Private Club course. The bank's engagement in this sport is not an accident – Citi Handlowy has been supporting golf initiatives for years, and Citigroup is the official partner of the Ryder Cup Europe.
tag-3: "We decided to support the development of golf as it is beautiful and exclusive sport that gives a lot of pleasure and enjoyment to both the players and the viewers," said Piotr Kosno, Head of Platinum Clients Department at Citi Handlowy. "It is worth noting that in golf there is emphasis on culture and etiquette. Of importance is the fact that golf is a sport that will debut at the next Olympic Games. Our cooperation with the Polish Golf Union will also contribute to the development of the discipline among the youth and junior managers. This will also enhance the popularity of golf among women."
tag-4: Citi Handlowy supports golf initiatives in Poland, incorporating itself into the strategy of Citigroup, Citi Handlowy's strategic investor. Citi supports the discipline globally, acting as the main sponsor of the Ryder Cup Europe, one of the golfing world's most prestigious events. Held every two years, the Ryder Cup is a competition where the best golf teams from Europe and America face each other in a series of match play competitions.
tag-5: "Our bank's interactions with golf have a long history," notes Piotr Kosno. "We have been present in this sport for 15 years. By saying 'We are present,' I mean the managers and employees of our bank who have been playing golf for years. This sport is very close to us. Also, many of our clients and business partners play golf. Considering the position of Citi Handlowy that provides services to more than half of 500 top Poland's companies, supporting this discipline seems a natural and obvious choice."
tag-6: Bank Handlowy w Warszawie S.A. is one of the leading financial institutions in Poland offering a wide and modern range of corporate, investment and consumer products and services under the Citi Handlowy brand. Through the bank's modern distribution channels and a network of more than 153 branches, Citi Handlowy provides its services to 20,000 corporate and 965,000 consumer clients. The capital group of the bank includes the Brokerage House of Bank Handlowy and Handlowy Leasing. Inclusion in the global network of Citigroup – a pre-eminent financial services company – provides Citi Handlowy clients with an access to financial services in more than 100 countries. For more information, please visit www.citihandlowy.pl.
